projectDescription: This project is my attempt at making a simple version of Trello and then using it to help the creation and development of my other projects.
Tracks a users progress in weightlifting and nutrition. Giving feedback and analytics to the user to suggest how they can improve their workouts and track their progress
Goes to popular sites like op.gg and u.gg to gather data from the username given and provide statistics.

A webtool that students can use to study different fields of science or engineering. This webtool includes reading sections for the student to study and questions to help soldify concepts.
